short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily add data to your Google Sheets directly from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickSheet Adder is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to streamline your workflow by allowing you to quickly append data directly to Google Sheets without leaving your browser window
